column4: Last night I installed the KDE desktop, and since the install my login screen is over sized.  If I run dpkg reconfigure xserver-xorg, will this solve my problem?
i dont know where it is in kde, but in gnome there's an option to set a default resoulution for your computer
without having to reconfigre...but, it is an option and it will work
are you speaking of the default for the login screen, or the gui session?
